name: Parad0x
description: Parad0x is a 2D platformer, set in a post apocalyptic world. You take the role of XEP#30, a human who has been captured in a laboratory by Paradox, the leader of the evil organiation called Pread0x. Pread0x thinks they can change the world when every single human becomes a mutant. But, there's still one last resistance in the world that still thinks they have hope. Thus, the battle between them continues...
